comment: Class for building file and web URLs.
commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Class for building file and web URLs.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
commenthtml: Class for building file and web URLs.
inlinecomment: ' Class for building file and web URLs.

methods.label: AddURLParameter
methods.comment: Adds a query string parameter to append to the TargetPath URL.
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code creates a web request using a URLBuilder
%END REM
Dim response as WebResponse
Dim server as New WebServer()
Dim request as WebRequest
Dim builder as New URLBuilder()
builder.isHttps = True
builder.targetHost = &quot;httpstat.us&quot;
builder.targetPath = &quot;200&quot;
Call builder.addUrlParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;, &quot;1000&quot;)
Set request = server.createRequestWithUrl(builder.toString(False))
methods.signature: Function AddURLParameter(Key As String, Value As String) As URLBuilder
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Adds a query string parameter to append to the TargetPath URL.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Adds a query string parameter to append to the TargetPath URL.
methods.inlinecomment: ' Adds a query string parameter to append to the TargetPath URL.
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM<br />    The following code creates a web request using a URLBuilder<br />%END REM<br />Dim response as WebResponse<br />Dim server as New WebServer()<br />Dim request as WebRequest<br />Dim builder as New URLBuilder()<br />builder.isHttps = True<br />builder.targetHost = &quot;httpstat.us&quot;<br />builder.targetPath = &quot;200&quot;<br />Call builder.addUrlParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;, &quot;1000&quot;)<br />Set request = server.createRequestWithUrl(builder.toString(False))

methods.label: RemoveParameter
methods.comment:
Removes a URL parameter. Note: parameters are an array of key/value pairs, so you cannot change a parameter. This would be done by removing the parameter and adding a new one. 
One typical use case for this would be re-using the same URLBuilder for multiple calls with different query string arguments.
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code builds a URL, removes a non-existent query-string parameter and removes an actual query-string parameter.
%END REM
Dim response as WebResponse
Dim server as New WebServer()
Dim request as WebRequest
Dim builder as New URLBuilder()
builder.isHttps = True
builder.targetHost = &quot;httpstat.us&quot;
builder.targetPath = &quot;200&quot;
Call builder.addUrlParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;, &quot;1000&quot;)
Call builder.RemoveParameter(&quot;Sleep&quot;)    &apos; Does nothing, parameter is &quot;sleep&quot;, not &quot;Sleep&quot;
Call builder.removeParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;)   &apos; Removes sleep query string parameter
methods.signature: Function RemoveParameter(Key As String) As URLBuilder
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Removes a URL parameter. Note: parameters are an array of key/value pairs, so you cannot change a parameter. This would be done by removing the parameter and adding a new one. <br />One typical use case for this would be re-using the same URLBuilder for multiple calls with different query string arguments.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Removes a URL parameter. Note: parameters are an array of key/value pairs, so you cannot change a parameter. This would be done by removing the parameter and adding a new one. <br />One typical use case for this would be re-using the same URLBuilder for multiple calls with different query string arguments.
methods.inlinecomment:
' Removes a URL parameter. Note: parameters are an array of key/value pairs, so you cannot change a parameter. This would be done by removing the parameter and adding a new one. 
One typical use case for this would be re-using the same URLBuilder for multiple calls with different query string arguments.
methods.codesamplehtml: %REM<br />    The following code builds a URL, removes a non-existent query-string parameter and removes an actual query-string parameter.<br />%END REM<br />Dim response as WebResponse<br />Dim server as New WebServer()<br />Dim request as WebRequest<br />Dim builder as New URLBuilder()<br />builder.isHttps = True<br />builder.targetHost = &quot;httpstat.us&quot;<br />builder.targetPath = &quot;200&quot;<br />Call builder.addUrlParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;, &quot;1000&quot;)<br />Call builder.RemoveParameter(&quot;Sleep&quot;)    &apos; Does nothing, parameter is &quot;sleep&quot;, not &quot;Sleep&quot;<br />Call builder.removeParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;)   &apos; Removes sleep query string parameter

arguments.label: Key
arguments.comment: Key of URL parameter to be removed. If there is no parameter with the passed key, URL parameters are not changed and no error is raised.
arguments.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Key of URL parameter to be removed. If there is no parameter with the passed key, URL parameters are not changed and no error is raised.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
arguments.commenthtml: Key of URL parameter to be removed. If there is no parameter with the passed key, URL parameters are not changed and no error is raised.
arguments.inlinecomment: ' Key of URL parameter to be removed. If there is no parameter with the passed key, URL parameters are not changed and no error is raised.

methods.label: ToString
methods.comment:
Outputs the URL as a string, using Protocol + TargetHost + TargetPath + URL parameters. Protocol is file:///, http:// or https://, depending on which property is set. 
URL parameters are output in alphabetical order on key.
methods.codesample:
%REM
    The following code builds a URL and returns it as a string.
%END REM
Dim response as WebResponse
Dim server as New WebServer()
Dim request as WebRequest
Dim builder as New URLBuilder()
builder.isHttps = True
builder.targetHost = &quot;httpstat.us&quot;
builder.targetPath = &quot;200&quot;
Call builder.addUrlParameter(&quot;sleep&quot;, &quot;1000&quot;)
Print builder.toString(false)   &apos;HTTPS://httpstat.us/200?sleep=1000
methods.signature: Function ToString(URLEncode As Boolean) As String
methods.commentblock: <div class="description">	<ul class="blockList">		<li class="blockList">			<div class="comments"><!-- comment --><pre>Outputs the URL as a string, using Protocol + TargetHost + TargetPath + URL parameters. Protocol is file:///, http:// or https://, depending on which property is set. <br />URL parameters are output in alphabetical order on key.</pre></div>			<hr />		</li>	</ul></div>
methods.commenthtml: Outputs the URL as a string, using Protocol + TargetHost + TargetPath + URL parameters. Protocol is file:///, http:// or https://, depending on which property is set. <br />URL parameters are output in alphabetical order on key.
methods.inlinecomment:
' Outputs the URL as a string, using Protocol + TargetHost + TargetPath + URL parameters. Protocol is file:///, http:// or https://, depending on which property is set. 
URL parameters are output in alphabetical order on key.
